Hello everyone. Hoping you're all having a wonderful holiday season!

This Christmas we're going to double your FREE packages. 

So you'll get:

**Blacklist Monitoring:**  
- 64 Blacklist Monitors  
See all features on our Blacklist Monitoring Pricing Page:  
https://hetrixtools.com/pricing/blacklist-monitor/  

**Uptime Monitoring:**  
- 10 uptime monitors  
- 10 server monitors  
- 1 minute check frequency  
- Select 3 out of 12 monitoring locations  
See all features on our Uptime Monitoring Pricing Page:  
https://hetrixtools.com/pricing/uptime-monitor/  

**Included in all packages:**  
- Private/Public Uptime Reports  
- White Label Reports  
- Bulk Reports (Public Status Page)  
- [Account Activity](https://docs.hetrixtools.com/free-accounts-inactivity/) required (as with any of our free accounts)  
- All features are included on the pricing pages linked above  

**How to obtain this offer:**  
(a) Register for a free HetrixTools account (if you don't already have one)  
(b) Reply to this thread with your account's Public Key, found here https://hetrix.tools/public-key  
(c) Your account will be manually upgraded to the double free package (within 24hrs)  
_Promo Notes:  
- cannot stack with any other of our promos  
- valid only for free accounts  
- valid only for the first <del>20</del> <del>40</del> 60 accounts  
- valid until 31 Dec 2017_

Please allow up to 24 hours for your accounts to be upgraded, because staff is very limited this holiday season the upgrades may take some time to process. No need to open support tickets about it. Thank you for understanding.

Happy Holidays to everyone!
